## New Release PR

### All OSes

- [ ] bump `version` on `pubspec.yaml`

### windows

- [ ] bump `msix_version` on `pubspec.yaml`

### macos

- [ ] update `macos/fastlane/metadata/ja/release_notes.txt`
- [ ] update `macos/fastlane/metadata/en-US/release_notes.txt`
